page.title: 16Melchbourne Stud
page.content: The Melchbourne Stud was established in 1974. There arefive brood mares and three of them have foals this summer. The Stud is run and managed entirely by the owner. The nine acres of land upon which the mares run is beautifully maintained and all the fencing is post and rail. The foundation mare of the Stud - False Evidence is 22 years old and is still producing good foals. Her fourth generation, Dreyfus won at Warwick in July 1985. Another of her offspring, Cry of Truth, was top 2 year old filly in 1974. She is now 13 years old and a brood mare at the Stud. The foals are weaned at Denton and are sold as yearlings.
